From: 
To: 
Cc: ' 
(USANYS)" 
;ANYS)" `M>, 
> 
Subject: RE: Tartaglione / Epstein 
Date: Fri. 06 Dec 2019 17:08:23 +0000 
(USANYS)" 
Nick and I need to compile the witness statements anyway in the next week or so, so we will do that and send you all of 
the inmate notes, and the relevant MCC employee notes (who talked about the July 23 attempt). 
From (USANYS)
Sent: Friday, December 6, 2019 10:43 AM 
To (USANYS)>; (USANYS) 
Cc: 
> 
Subject: RE: Tartaglione / Epstein 
No deadline. I'm also happy to make this as easy as possible for you guys, if you want to give me access to the drive and 
point me to the interview folder. We obviously won't produce anything without running it by you, but don't want this to 
be any extra work for you guys. 
Co-Chief, Narcotics Unit 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Frida , December 6, 2019 10:32 AM 
To 
(USANYS) 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Tartaglione / Epstein 
(USANYS) 
Just a bail application. We interviewed a lot of people so this isn't a particularly quick request. Do you have a deadline? 
From: USANYS)
Sent: Friday, December 6, 2019 10:30 AM 
To (USANYS) > (USANYS) 
a> 
Cc: > 
Subject: RE: Tartaglione / Epstein 
Hey guys —  just following up, though it sounds like you're busy with defendants fleeing... 
Co-Chief, Narcotics Unit 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, December 3, 2019 3:25 PM 
To: USANYS) ; (USANYS) > 
Cc: 
I 
Subject: Tartaglione / Epstein 
EFTA00023226

Hey Guys —  we continue to get requests from the Tartaglione defense team related to the Epstein investigation. In light of 
a recent request, can we please review your notes from inmates in the SHU on the date of the attempted suicide to 
determine if there are any inmates who gave statements that corroborate Tartaglione's account that he saved Epstein's 
life? We think this could arguably be penalty-phase Brady, so we'd like to review this in the first instance, and then discuss 
with you any disclosures we think need to be made. 
Co-Chief, Narcotics Unit 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00023227
